column2: title=''SEVEN: An Anglo-American Literary Review'', Volume 6

column3: Marion E. Wade Center of Wheaton College]]

column1: '''''SEVEN''''', '''Volume 6''' is a volume of ''[[SEVEN]]'', a scholarly journal published by the [[Marion E. Wade Center]].
*"The Latin Letters of C.S. Lewis to Don Giovanni Calabria"
*"Dorothy L. Sayers: Critic of Detective Fiction"
*"An Introduction to Charles Williams's Incarnationalism and the ''Taliessin'' Poetry"
*"''The Silmarillion'' and the Rise of Evil: The Birth Pains of Middle-earth"
*Review Article: "I Wrote it Just for Fun"
